question: A boat goes 40 km upstream in 8 hours and 36 km downstream in 6 hours. The speed of the boat in still water is :
explanation:
Speed upstream $latex = \\frac{40}{8} = 5km/hr&s=1$
Speed downstream $latex = \\frac{36}{6} = 6 km/hr&s=1$
âˆ´ Speed of boat in still water $latex = \\frac{1}{2}(5+6) = 5.5 km/hr&s=1$
Hence option [B] is correct answer.
